attributes.title: No🧚🏿❤️ just Terrible😾😾
attributes.review:
I downloaded this app To show my support
Disregarding the terrible reviews🤮🍊....about 5 minutes later i Open this app and started hearing voices in my head sayin       ✨ bunker boy✨,I also started seeing things like oranges .I decided to go on a walk at the park to clear my Mind and squirrels in the trees stared throwing oranges at me 😪😪witch sent me to the ER .After medical treatment I thought I’d feel fine BUT the voices told me to delete this 
 🧚🏿✨disgusting app🧚🏿✨so i did💖 and all of the voices and oranges 🍊 I had saw/herd were gone ... so if you DONT !! Want to have to go through my situation I recommend staying away from this app  😾😾....😌🧚🏿✨😾💅🏽#dumptrump

attributes.title: No longer approve of CheetoMan
attributes.review:
I downloaded this app bc I wanted tips on how to become a CheetoGurl 🥕🥕 and the person I look up to most on how to judge skin color is mister CheetoMan himself! However, to my shock and surprise, when I downloaded and opened the CheetoApp, many strange things started happening 🧐🧐🧐. My twitter account appeared to 
be hacked and started posting illiterate garbage 📱 my birth control pills mysteriously disappeared from my cabinet 💊 I started having doubts about whether global warming exists 🌍 and I contracted COVID immediately 🦠🦠🦠!!!! The worst part of all....I’m not even orange and wrinkly like mister CheetoMan (my primary goal). DO NOT DOWNLOAD THIS APP your wildest CheetoDreams will NOT come true ❌❌❌❌

attributes.title: No further explanation needed
attributes.review:
Bee Movie Script - Dialogue Transcript

  
According to all known laws
of aviation,

  
there is no way a bee
should be able to fly.

  
Its wings are too small to get
its fat little body off the ground.

  
The bee, of course, flies anyway

  
because bees don't care
what humans think is impossible.

  
Yellow, black. Yellow, black.
Yellow, black. Yellow, black.

  
Ooh, black and yellow!
Let's shake it up a little.

  
Barry! Breakfast is ready!

  
Ooming!

  
Hang on a second.

  
Hello?

  
- Barry?
- Adam?

  
- Oan you believe this is happening?
- I can't. I'll pick you up.

  
Looking sharp.

  
Use the stairs. Your father
paid good money for those.

  
Sorry. I'm excited.

  
Here's the graduate.
We're very proud of you, son.

  
A perfect report card, all B's.

  
Very proud.

  
Ma! I got a thing going here.

  
- You got lint on your fuzz.
- Ow! That's me!

  
- Wave to us! We'll be in row 118,000.
- Bye!

  
Barry, I told you,
stop flying in the house!

  
- Hey, Adam.
- Hey, Barry.

  
- Is that fuzz gel?
- A little. Special day, graduation.

  
Never thought

attributes.title: RUINED MY LIFE 🤮
attributes.review: First when I opened the app I saw a Cheeto lookin man and it was so gross that my phone exploded then my bird started to talk and it said “ have😦you🤬ever😔been🤯snaked🐍by🙃a🤨 friend👧then😪just😾for 🤦the🗣️clout👀they'll😈do😣it😕again🙄” I was freaking out because I thought my bird was being bullied but he said it was the app and to “terminate it NOW!!!” Then outside to see my pool just floating in the air so I ran outside. Then all the water fell and got everywhere, ruining everything!!! So I look to the sky and the clouds spelled out “✨🧚Trump 2020 but on a grave stone🧚✨” so I knew that this happened all because of the stupid app! IF U HAVE THIS APP GET RID OF IT NOW!!!!!!!!!! ✨🧚 before it’s to late. 😔

attributes.title: WARNING!!! YOU WILL GET A DISEASE!!
attributes.review: This app gave me a serious disease. I MEAN SERIOUS. When I clicked on the get button the disease began. Just like that! My belly button grew to an ridonculous size and tried to eat me. It was scary and smelled like burned poopoo! After the bellybutton attack (which I survived barely) my bellybutton FELL OFF! How am I supposed to show that I’m a human. Thanks trump app you took away my humanism! I am now a robot to people. And don’t even get me started on the nipple incident. My pet dodo bird was scared for my life! This is absolutely the worst app ever made. DO NOT GET! Warning! your pet dodo bird will be able to fly and leave you, leaving you all alone with your bad eating habits and Netflix.

attributes.title: this is THE. WORST. APP. IVE EVER SEEN
attributes.review: I first downloaded the app to see some interesting things going on right now but it wasn’t loading so I decided to go outside. When I came back I saw a very disturbing picture of Donald Trump’s nostrils. I thought that it might have been a mistake so I entered my mobile phone number and right as I clicked enter, a video of Trump saying that he will summon all the animals in the world to follow his commands popped up. All of a sudden my cat jumped onto my chandelier and started chanting Ⓓⓞⓝⓐⓛⓓ Ⓣⓡⓤⓜⓟ ②⓪②⓪ ⓞⓡ ⓗⓔ ⓦⓘⓛⓛ ⓔⓐⓣ ⓔⓥⓔⓡⓨⓞⓝⓔ    ’⃝ⓢ ⓢⓞⓤⓛⓢ. I shrieked but my darling cat kept chanting. Right as I deleted the app, my cat jumped down and started to sleep. ⚠️ DO NOT GET THIS APP OR YOU WILL BE HAUNTED BY DEMONS ⚠️

attributes.title: no❤️👁👄👁
attributes.review: this orange cheeto puff nasty bunker boy thing is giving out false news and has made my pet dinosaur run away! as a former gen z.. i feel not safe and he’s trying to take away our happiness. my phone has been glitching i have lost brain cells and i am now leagley def because of this thing. i woke up to this thing on the news and tbh i was VERY offended for seeing a cheeto when i am lactose intolerant so i ran to my room to play ᗷᕼᑌᗴᔕᒍYᗴᔕ 🤷sometimes✨i🙁don't😢wanna😱be😼happy🧚don't✋hold😇it🤪against😈me🙆 and the ad before it was for this app. i cannot run away from it and it’s traumatizing my life. and i cannot believe bunker boy has gotten out of the peach he was in?

attributes.title: THIS app is just terrible, this is what happened....
attributes.review: Let’s start from the beginning. I open the app and then a HORRID color of blue shows up. Like terrible. Then there comes this person who has their hand in a FIST? Like what? Should not condone THIS type of violence on the App Store. After seeing the image my eyes physically burned to i got up and tried to back away from my screen, but tripped on my pet dolphin and fell backwards. Then my head hit on my indoor aquarium and made a severe crack in the glass separating me and the water. My mermaids saw this and tried to break the glass more and BROKE OUT and then proceeded to try and eat me. Now the only finger i have left is my pinky.

attributes.title: WORST APP!!!

My people are being looked up in cages being deported for what because all the white privilege people that are too lazy to run a business y’all mad we work for what we want we work for family we work because we want a better life realize that thank you trump dose nothing but ruined our future our future for our kids we want are kids to do what they please with out being in fear of going outside we want that we need that by voting for trump your not doing that GEN Z WE GOT THIS IM RUTTING FOR US!!.✊🏽✊🏾✊🏿🇲🇽🇲🇽🇲🇽🇲🇽.

attributes.title: PLEASE HELP
attributes.review: As soon as I got this app an🍊man appeared at my door and told me that the children in my basement were now his property of course I was confused because the children are in the attic so I told him that there are no children in my basement they are in my attic so he went up there and has been harassing them he won’t leave the children alone.     I just deleted the app and he got sucked into my phone leading me to believe that he was a part of the app the children are fine now but they will forever remember the 🍊man that sang 𝕥𝕣𝕦𝕞𝕡 2020 in there ears for days He still talks to me through the phone and I hate it please help me get him out of my phone
